DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether child moderate severe bronchiolitis treat standard racemic epinephrine therapy via 70:30 helium-oxygen ( heliox ) drive nebulization improvement measurement airway rapidly treated conventional air-oxygen driven nebulization .
DOC.brief_title: Heliox-Driven Racemic Epinephrine Nebulization Treatment Moderate Severe Bronchiolitis Pediatric ED Patients
DOC.criteria: Any child 212 month old see emergency department . A clinical bronchiolitis score > 3 modify Wood 's Clinical Bronchiolitis Score ( MWCBS ) . Diagnostic criterion bronchiolitis include tachypnea , cough , prolong expiratory phase , wheeze , rale , chest retraction , hyperinflation lung chest radiograph . After consent patient study , respiratory syncytial virus ( RSV ) infection test rapid enzymelinked immunoabsorbent assay nasal secretion . No child exclude base race gender Patients age 2 month great 12 month Patients cyanotic heart disease Patients lobar pneumonia , define result chest radiograph . The presence interstitial disease diffuse patchy mark consistent atelectasis chest radiograph exclude patient . Patients croup . Patients foreign body aspiration . Patients history cystic fibrosis , bronchopulmonary dysplasia chronic lung disease . Patients liver renal disease . Patients sickle cell anemia . Patients require mechanical ventilation . Patients develop supraventricular tachycardia secondary racemic epinephrine administration . Patients tracheomalacia bronchomalacia . Patients receive bronchodilator within 2 hour initiation study . Patients receive systemic corticosteroid within 72 hour enrollment Patients suffer persistent airway hyperreactivity 3 month study . Patients tolerate nasal cannulae 45 60 minute .
